description: Try our easy to follow Choc, Cherry & Coconut Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc, Cherry & Coconut Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tart cases from tins. Fill with cherry mixture. Spread chocolate ganache over cherry filling and leave to set. Serve topped with fresh cherries.
